title: Generate Monthly Project Progress Report
description: A project manager needs to generate the official monthly progress report for project stakeholders.

tasks.description: Gather the latest schedule update, cost report, and safety statistics for the month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the required data from various systems.

tasks.description: Use a reporting template to populate the data into a standard format.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully populates the monthly report template.

tasks.description: Generate the final report as a PDF and distribute it to the project stakeholder mailing list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the final PDF and emails it to the correct recipients.
